Media Kit

Introduction

Hello, I'm Jenn, the voice behind Wanderlost + Found. I caught the travel bug on a summer-long backpacking trip through Europe during my university years and I've been on a mission to explore the world and get lost on my adventures ever since.

With a passion for photography and searching out unique experiences while exploring the globe, I created my brand to inspire others to be lost in new locations, find themselves in the moment, wander this Earth, and be astounded by it.

My Stats

With an average engagement rate on Instagram of over 28%, my engagement is 300% higher than other travel accounts of similar size and over 500% higher than the average influencer on Instagram (as reported on influencer.co). My newly created blog builds on this engagement and offers my followers a more detailed and in-depth look at the destinations I explore.

My Audience

My audience is split between men and women, and distributed across the globe, with the largest percentage hailing from North America. While many of my posts are written with the female traveller in mind, both men and women find content on my blog that is valuable and interesting to them.

Work With Me

I would love to work with you!

Instagram Posts: My Instagram followers are highly engaged with what I post on my regular feed as well as my Stories. I can promote your destination, property, or brand with top quality images and tagging both the photo and the caption.

Instagram Stories: Stories are a great way to show off a more in-depth look at your destination, property, or brand. Videos and images can be combined together to show a behind-the-scenes or provide more information. You will be tagged in the Story, and your branded hashtag can also be used.

Blog Posts: Blog posts are a great way to provide more detailed information, or additional photography. Your brand, destination, or property can be featured in a dedicated blog post, which will be promoted across all social platforms.

Content Creation: I can produce top quality imagery for your social media platforms and/or website. We can discuss your vision for the project, and what you're looking for, to come up with a plan, and I can provide content with or without me in them.

Social Media Consultant: I can help you establish and grow your online presence across a number of social media platforms. We can discuss your needs and goals to come up with a customized plan that will maximize existing online campaigns, create new ones, and/or increase your brand awareness.

Need help just getting started? No problem! I also offer instruction on starting and building a brand on social media platforms, as well as best practices to get your account growing immediately.

Visit Work With Me or send me an email to learn more.
